storyInfo: Saria decides to seek Silence, while Rosmontis decides to see Loken. Two dance a lonely dance in the quiet lab.

attributes.content: It's not getting through.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Who are you calling, Saria?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Tin Man.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The metal guy? Did something happen?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm afraid so. Maylander would not have joined our pursuers otherwise.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The army has an agreement with Maylander? Why are they targeting us? What happened to the Tin Man?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I had a look around the way you taught me, Saria. All the soldiers are gone, and so are the agents who were on us.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: The pursuers would not have disappeared if she was just staying as the rear guard.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Unlessâ€”she offered something that satisfied them.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The silver liquid? I saw it around her!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...Transmitter?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: She was in contact with Dorothy at Site 359 and undoubtedly got the Transmitter from her. Does Dorothy expect her to do something?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Dorothy is still in military custody. She couldn't possibly be trying to reach out to the military and Ferdinand through her.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Could it be Parvis or...?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Saria...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't worry, Ifrit.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: She'll be fine.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'm trying to tell you not to squeeze your communicator so hard. You're crushing it.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...Thanks.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'm not worried. Silence isn't so reckless.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: She stayed after she talked to you. I'm sure she thought it through.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: She doesn't know what she's up against. The machinations of the state are far crueler than she can imagine.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You think she doesn't know that? I'm sure she thought about it.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Silence works hard. She's always working when I see her. The others say it's like she's being chased by something you can't see or touch.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Maybe this'll all be cleared up by the time we see her again.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Then I'll tell her, yeah, I'm upset you left me behind, but I knew you could do it.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Saria notices that Ifrit's hands are trembling. She wants to say something to comfort her.
But words fail her.
She realizes that, even though Ifrit's words were, in part, intended to comfort, she does not know the Silence that Ifrit speaks of.
Silence is ready. Silence knows what she is about to face.
She has never thought about it that way.
Over there, Saria.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The army is pulling out, but not in direction of the military garrison.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Is the Transmitter really the clue to Kristen's whereabouts?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Let's follow them.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Silence wouldn't want you to put yourself in danger again.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: She promised we would go together!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: She said, 'Saria will return here the moment she wakes up.' 'That's the sort of woman she is.'
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It's not...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: 'It's not the rational way.' That's what you're trying to say, isn't it?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: We're not here to take risks, not to waste Silence's courage. We're just waiting for her at the end.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: She realizes that Ifrit is much taller than she was a few years ago, when she was rescued from the laboratory.
In the face of impending danger, there is no impatience or recklessness in her eyes, only courage and wisdom.
Let's go.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: By the way, Saria, I saw a falling star when I got to Trimounts.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: A star? You mean the object that fell on the Triton factory in District 13?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: It was a star!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: And Silence told me a story where all our differences disappear when the stars fall.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You and Silence are gonna make up, right?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Yes... we will.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Great!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Will they?
Saria turns back to look at the familiar streets of Trimounts.
The path she is about to tread suddenly feels unfamiliar.
She has overcome many challenges. What lies before her is far from a crisis.
But, for the first time, she feels out of control.
Holy hell, I'm freezing!
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: Look out, there's a car.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: That was a close shave! Can't even think clearly in this cold.
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: I tell you, sir, this weather, it's all that tech company's doing.
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: They use drones to spray chemicals that make our lungs freeze with every breath.
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: They want to kidnap us, put our brains in jars, and turn us into nutrients for their artificial sun.
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: Look up there in the skyâ€”
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Those stars ain't stars. They're cameras that the monsters sent up there to watch our every move. They even kidnapped our president, put his skin on, and locked all of Columbia under their control!
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: Here's a few bills... Find a warm place to spend the night.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I don't need money, sir. I'm just waiting for dawn to break.
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: Between the two of us, I'm organizing a protest against the Vice President and these tech companies. The people must wake up!
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: Take this too. All my money. You can have it.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Wait, sir...
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: I knew I would find you here.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Good morning, Ferdinand.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: One more cup of tea and the sun should be up. Time for me to go to work on the other side.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Enough with the act, Parvis. When did you start working with Kristen?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You, Jara, Justin Jr., and Nasti. You fooled me into thinking that I had Kristen isolated, that I was just one step from success.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I became a laughing stock! My gamble, all my efforts, just another rung on the ladder for her to climb!
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Tea, Ferdinand?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Underhanded old goat?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Let me make one thing clear: I don't know where Kristen is. She doesn't trust me so much, and I'm not so interested in her secret.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: But you didn't come to ask questions. Otherwise, you would have brought the muscle you borrowed from that colonel, as you did with Jara.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: It's not like you to swallow insults from Pioneers, and come back to grovel at the feet of the Colonel after he abandoned you once.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You set your mind to it. Why did you give up so close to the truth?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: No wild guesses.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Perhaps you should look at yourself in the mirror, Ferdinand.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You're jealous of her.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You're jealous that she gets men to fight for her, even when she's not around.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You're jealous that it only took her a few words to earn the loyalty that took you so much time and money to buy.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You're jealous of her charisma.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: There's a part of you, somewhere deep down, that's enthralled by her. The more you deny it, the more you hate herâ€”
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Why are you telling me this?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Because it's how I feel.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Look outside, Ferdinand.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: When I was little, I never saw stars in the night sky.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: All I saw was the silhouette of the great spire, the light of witchcraft lightning up the skies.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Adults told me it was the eye of the Witch King, watching over every inch of Leithanien.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: And I thought, what was the meaning of life, if the Witch King was the sole miracle chosen by fate?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Didn't you despise the efforts of those stupid casters who wanted to summon the Witch King's souls?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Yes, I opposed it.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: My kin and former colleagues spent their entire lives trying to recreate a fleeting miracle in this time and age.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: But in my long years of research, I've realized that a miracle is so because it is a coincidence that cannot be controlled or recreated.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Only such a coincidence can break the cage of fate that traps us all.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You see Kristen as that coincidence?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: She has the potential to create miracles.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You have your dream, and I have mine. If she is the fated miracle, than what are we? Waste coming off the production line? Meaningless noise?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Why despair, Ferdinand?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Perhaps the fate of mankind does hinge upon one singularity, who will break all shackles and become the eyes of all, to see sights that we could not have imagined.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: But that does not mean our lives are destined to fall by the wayside.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Miracles are born in the journey of evolution. A journey made up of all our dreams: Yours, mine, even that foolish tramp outside.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Why are you telling me this?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Feeling better? Have some tea. It'll put some color in your face, so you won't be so embarrassed when the kids see you on their way to work.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I've lost everything. There isn't much for you to remember.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I'm in no hurry. We can talk about work once you're done with your tea.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: It's always good to chat with an old friend. We took our first steps together, after all.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Hello there, good sir!
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: Megaphone and sign boards?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: This is what you spent the money on? Not food and blankets?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: There are things more important than creature comforts!
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: Give me that board.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: 'Rhine Lab.' At least spell the company's name right if you're going to protest it.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: That's much better! Thank you, sir!
attributes.name: Homeless Resident

attributes.content: Tell me.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: What do you dream of? What is the future you're fighting for?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: How do you like my vivarium, Doctor?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Nobody can just barge in. And Rosmontis seems to like it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Rosmontis stands quietly in the verdant lab.
She carefully observes each plant, then meticulously records their form in her notebook.
Her gaze stops on the last page of the notebook.
You know it is where that letter is kept.

attributes.options: Are you still reading the letter, Rosmontis?

attributes.content: Yes, Doctor.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I want to remember what happened today and record it in my terminal, before I forget.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Loken... Loken Williams...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What is the 'home' that he talked about like? Is it like Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: No.;No way.

attributes.content: Then he's not my family.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I don't like him, Doctor. I came into contact with many feelings that I didn't like through him.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I want to pick them out and put them somewhere that won't bother me. Amiya helped me clean them up before she left, but they keep growing.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: What kind of feelings?

attributes.content: ...Loss.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: And... destruction.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I want to destroy them. It's not right. Pith would be angry...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I shouldn't see Loken again, should I, Doctor?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Do you want to learn about your past, Rosmontis?

attributes.content: Memory is precious. I don't want to use it on bad things.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But I want to see with my own eyes again. I want to know what I would do.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It may not be to learn... it may be to throw it away again.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But I'll say goodbye properly this time.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Okay.;We'll find Loken.
Get some rest before that, though.

attributes.content: Mm-hm...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: (Give Rosmontis your jacket);(Put your jacket on Rosmontis's shoulders)
Go to sleep.

attributes.content: Mm... Doctor...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The young Feline lies down at your side, clutching the jacket you gave her tightly.
Her breathing is fragile yet resilient, as it is when she is awake.
She's tired.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Rosmontis's Arts are heavily dependent on intention.;The day took a toll on her.

attributes.content: What about you, Doctor?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Let's talk somewhere else, let Rosmontis sleep.

attributes.content: Your brow's furrowed.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Should I cooperate with the army's investigation?;Should I surrender to the Maylander Foundation?;Rhodes Island has been dragged into the maelstrom of Trimounts.

attributes.content: I arranged for you to go to Rhine. I have proof that you had legitimate reasons to enter the HQ building, and that you have nothing to do with the attack on the Vice President.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The army can't actually do anything about you. Don't worry about them.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Ho'olheyak just loves to drag people into these messes... kooky bint.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: There's no real witness to the 'crime scene,' though.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hard to say if the Maylander Foundation would really believe that some completely unrelated person lopped off the head of one of their top agents, or if they suspect that it's all just an act.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The explosion at the Triton factory, the attack on the Vice President, Kristen's disappearance... Trimounts is in chaos right now.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It may be irresponsible to say this, but neither the army nor the Maylander Foundation have time to deal with Rhodes Island. You're not at the center of the maelstrom.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: No need to be so nervous, Doctor.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Still, I'm responsible for your situation here. Our partnership's still good. You helped me, and I'll do my best to help you.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If it comes to it, I can arrange to get you, Rosmontis, and Iffy out of Trimounts right now.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: That's not what I'm concerned about, Muelsyse.;Sincerity is the foundation of cooperation, Muelsyse.
You're looking for both Saria and Kristen?;Are you trying to stop something, or to put something right?;Your position has been vague from the beginning.
We're partners, but I don't know what you really think.

attributes.content: A dance, Doctor?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It's no fun being interrogated like this.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Muelsyse puts her hands behind her back, turns around, and takes a couple of steps. She looks back at you with a rare, serious expression on her face.
Music fills the air.
It is a relaxed, soothing tune. You see moisture seep from the leaf veins, converging into a drop of dew.
More drops appear, leaving the leaves and catching up to you and Muelsyse, moving with the flow of the melody. You see the rhythm of each droplet, light as breath.
They are the melody itself.
Feel it, Doctor. It will guide our steps.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Your droplets seem 'free' in this vivarium.;The air in this vivarium seen 'clean'.

attributes.content: Very astute, Doctor.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: From lightning to irrigation to atmosphere control, none of the systems in this vivarium employ Originium technology. It is the cleanest place in Trimounts.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: This is the one place in Trimounts where I feel at ease.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Oftentimes, I choose to operate through a clone not because I want to.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But because I have to.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Muelsyse disappears from your vision. You find your hand holding nothing but air.
The droplets form a ribbon of water, gently pulling you towards a corner of the vivarium.
The Pale Fir is extremely sensitive to its environment. Pollution from Originium industries have reduced its habitat to a small number of hilly areas in Columbia.
attributes.name: Automated Commentary

attributes.content: The droplets scatter and shatter, creating a mist between you and the firs.
You see the faint silhouette of a tombstone. Muelsyse sits quietly by it, picking away at the weeds that surround it.
You have never seen her so sad.
Is it a shadow of the past?
I grew up in an orphanage in Trenton, near Trimounts.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The headmaster said I was found on the doorsteps of the orphanage. No one knows who my parents are.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I realized at an early age that I was different.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: My powers are unique, but they are not Originium Arts. I'm much more sensitive to Originium than most people; even a slight increase in Originium concentration is enough to affect my health.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: What am I? No one knows.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That's why I've searched for the answer since I was little. Ironically, it's also the reason why my grades have always been good.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Finally, I found that word hidden away in some ancient books.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: 'Elves.'

attributes.content: The word is not unknown to you... you do have many secrets, don't you, Doctor?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Well, it's not important.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Anyway, I tracked down my biological parents' old Trimounts home, but the house had long since changed hands.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I followed the trail they left behind, and eventually found where they went.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It's this village right here... so remote I thought I made a mistake. Most of the buildings have fallen into ruin, they look to be centuries-old.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I didn't see anyone. I had a feeling as I went into the hills behind the village...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I saw a simple cemetery surrounded by pale firs, where dozens of tombstones lay.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: This village was not an Elven settlement. It was their graveyard.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Muelsyse stands up, looks at you, and fades away into the mist before the firs.
Your partner returns to your side.

attributes.options: Elven nature forced you to distance yourselves from modern civilization.;Why did your parents abandon you?

attributes.content: Distancing oneself from modern civilization is easier said than done.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: To spend your life in remote mountains, when you know that a more convenient, more advanced, more interesting life is right there, waiting for you to reach out.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: How are we, with our long lifespans, supposed to accept it?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Some of my people faded away in sorrow, some chose to end their own lives.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: More Elves chose to go into society, including my parents.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: They lived cautiously but bravely, looking for ways to survive in civilization without coming into contact with Originium.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: They knew Originium would kill them, someday. They accepted it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: They contracted Oripathy.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Elves are highly sensitive to Originium and lack resistance to Oripathy symptoms. Few live more than a month after contracting Oripathy.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Like most Elves, they could not accept spending the rest of their days in remote mountains, and sought a more convenient, more advanced, more interesting life, despite the dangers.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: They knew Originium would kill them, someday. They accepted it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Knowing their days were numbered, they left me behind in a village far away from the cities, and returned to the place where they came from, to await the coming of death.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Do you find it regrettable? Or absurd?;Are you looking for a way to change the fate of your people?

attributes.content: Next dance, Doctor.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: More droplets rise in the vivarium, as the music enters a new passage.
The smile returns to Muelsyse's face. The melody sings on. You do not know if the topic will continue.
Sometimes I envy Rhodes Island. There are so many people there.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: You came to Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: Oh, you knew?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I sneaked in once or twice to see if Iffy was doing well, and see what Saria was doing.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: And I saw someone standing on the deck, gazing at the sunset, lost in thought.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I didn't notice you.

attributes.content: Don't tell anyone. Just one of my tiny clones. No danger to anybody.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I thought, why would you be up on the deck with only your thoughts for company, when there's so much joy waiting down below?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I wanted to see if I could remember anything.;I feel like there used to be someone I would watch the sunset with.

attributes.content: Did you find any memories of that person?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: No.;......;After all these years, all I know is a name.

attributes.content: So there are answers beyond even your reach. That makes things seem a little bit fairer.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: She leads you on, doing a half pirouette.

attributes.options: You're a good dancer.

attributes.content: Of course I am. I was the ace of my university dance team.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: After I left the village, I spent all my time studying.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Every Columbian child knows that science and tech are the best way to change your life.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I studied to become the top of my class, then went to school in Trimounts, where I stayed on top.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I spent a lot of effort to blend into modern life. Fashion, gaming, literature, music, dance... I studied etiquette, met a lot of people.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: For others, these are hobbies, but for me, it's a mission, an exploration, a test.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I know it sounds weird, but I tasked myself to live life as hard as I could.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It's been a long time since I danced, though.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: With Saria and Kristen?

attributes.content: The droplets go around you. The lights of the vivarium cannot penetrate them. They hold fragments of the past, gentle, clear, yet untouchable.
The newly renovated lab, mostly empty bottles... Saria, and Kristen? And Muelsyse, with a disappointed look on her face.
The three stare at each other in middle of the room, like three wooden mannequins.
New Year's Eve, not long after Rhine Lab was founded... everyone was happy. I was the happiest.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I met Kristen and Saria shortly before I graduated.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Kristen is not your average investor's preferred partner. You know you're in for surprises the moment you see her, and not all of them are gonna be pleasant. As for Saria, she just felt steady as a rock.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: My advisor happened to be involved with a project of theirs, but she wasn't very interested, so she sent me in her stead.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I had nothing back then, other than my obsession with living hard. I tried everything and went nowhere. They helped me get over a period when I was lost between my identities as a graduating student and as an Elf.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It was just me, Kristen, Saria, Parvis and Ferdinand at the time.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Parvis hid himself upstairs, saying he couldn't stay up all night. Ferdinand left early for other business.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Can you believe it? At the end of the day, I couldn't find anyone to dance with me.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I ended up grabbing Saria... and Kristen.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: None of us knew how to dance in threes. I can still remember the looks on their faces!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Why are you so obsessed with Kristen?;Rhine Lab is important to you.

attributes.content: Because of my dream.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: We agreed she would help Nasti set out on her journey, and she'll bring my dream with her.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...To be more precise, Saria and Kristen are important to me.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I've always believed that we'll only get where we really want to be if the two of them work together.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The music ends. The vivarium is empty, except for Muelsyse standing opposite you, calm as a pale fir.
You hear the sound of the air circulation system running.
The wind on your face feels unusually moist. The scent of plants, the soft earth... you realize that the droplets of water, the music, and the dance really existed.
You've found my wobbliness, Doctor. Yes, I'm trying to manipulate everyone, including you...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But everything I do, I do for myself, the few kin that I have left, so we can breathe, feel the wind, run, travel freely...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: To make our journey a little less hard.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: All I've done, I did to keep the few friends I have, so that in this city, I won't be so...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: This is all I can tell you. All I can promise you.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: There are a lot of things you haven't made clear.;There are a lot of gaps in your story.
Should I trust you?;You didn't really manipulate me.

attributes.content: And so...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Help me one more time, Muelsyse.

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I must find Loken Williams.

attributes.content: Even if I could help you... why do you not ask me to help you and Rosmontis get out of Trimounts safely?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: We've come too far to turn back now.;Rhodes Island only goes forward.

attributes.content: Saria and Dr. Kal'tsit have reason to get involved. But what about you? Will you get to the bottom of all this, even if the price is a two-front war with the military and Maylander?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That's not the most logical choice.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: I want to help Rosmontis.;I want the truth.;I want to find myself.

attributes.content: She's sleeping soundly...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You want to find her lost past?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Are you so interested in Kristen's dream?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Do you believe you'll find your past in Trimounts?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Alright... we have a deal.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Our partnership will go on.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Who was that on the phone?
A lonely soul, searching for companions.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Since when have you two become such close friends?
We just happened to be going the same way for a while.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Same for you. When are you going to leave my lab? The smell of alcohol affects the equipment.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: That's so cold.
Thanks to you and that agent's improvisation, I have a dozen calls to make tonight just to keep you out of jail. Like hell am I doing this sober.
You got what you wanted. Is Kristen's price not enough for a businessman like you?
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Price? Are you reminding me how much I lost to this crazy plan?
Then you should have gone to Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Join the Chamber and play with the knights and speculators?
Yes, the plan has been lying in my terminal for years. I could make more money, and do so in a safer way.
But all those great projects... they're about a nation, an era.
I want to seize the opportunity before me, to see a future far beyond anyone's wildest dreams rise from my palms.
Is that a dream? From a practical person like you?
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Anyone can dream. Especially facing the fickle tides of fate.
You put it astutely. Going the same way.
Look at those scientists. For all the conflicts they went through, from friend to foe and from foe to friend, they all end up on the same path.
They all saw a part of themselves in the least likely of all futures.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: What about you?
A meaningless question. Why do you think I've tolerated your presence for so long?
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: That's why I like the 'going the same way' part. Even if it's only temporary.
Miss Nasti Lunorey.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: If we still have our life and liberty after tomorrowâ€”
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Will you come with me to the highest point in Trimounts, and take a good look at the sky that hasn't changed for thousands of years?
attributes.name: Justin Jr.
